question: I am a female aged 38 yrs.I have regular 28 day cycle. I have a ten yr old son.I was diagnosed with PCOD after marriage but I didnt have any problems in concieving.Last week I had a general body check-RBC -3-65 mil/cmmHb% - 10.3gm%Hematocrit - 31.2%Normocytic Hypochromic RBCsESR - 30TSH - 0.01 IU/mlFree T3 -  5.50  IU/mlFree T4 - 2.20   IU/mlGynecology : Pap smear - superficial cells and intermediate squamous cells. Back ground shows severe neutrophilic infiltrate.No evidence of specific infection.I tested negative for Diabetes, Hypertension, Hypercholesterolemia, Hepatitis and Cardiac problems.Is my Pap test something to worry about?What do I do for anemia?Do I take thyroxine supplements?Kindly advise me.Regards,jnags
title: pap smear result
